title: Fabulous Fleischer Folio. - Volume 1.
brief_description: Famous animators, Max and Dave Fleischer proudly bring you 7 stories. “The Song of the Birds” - how a boy shoots at a baby bird but learns the value of life. “To Spring” - a magical picture of Old Father Winter and the elves of Spring. “Play Safe” - a story of a St Bernard dog, dangerous trains and a little boy. “Hunky and Spunky” - Mother and Little Mule get into trouble with a prospector. “Toys will be Toys” - a fantastic toy parade after hours in a toy shop. “Small Fry” - a little fish learns to respect his elders. “Ants in the Plants” - an anteater meets his match when all the ants pull together. Rated: G
